column5: Can you purchase a Manitoba Outdoors card when you buy your fishing liscence?
Don't understand the question. What is a Manitoba Outdoors card and when did this go into effect? Is this similar to the Ontario Outdoor Card?
Yes or doesn't Manitoba have an outdoors card?
I live here and have never had a card for Manitoba. Used to be a paper license. Now it is online and I take a screenshot. Hope that works.
